about.title: About Me
about.content:
I connect large-scale operations with advanced AI solutions. After managing 300+ team members from China, the Philippines, Malaysia, and Vietnam at Topvan Group, I founded ThinkerCafe to democratize AI education and enterprise automation.

My unique background combines international team leadership, deep AI/data science expertise, and 10+ years of teaching experience. I don't just implement AI solutionsâ€”I build systems that empower people to work smarter.

I'm currently seeking opportunities to bring this combined expertise to enterprise AI consulting and digital transformation projects.

jobs.title: CEO & Founder
points: Led a distributed Taiwan-U.S. team to develop AI education and automation products.
Designed comprehensive AI courses (Personal OS, AI Communication Skills, Visual/System Hacker Series).
Built LINE Bots, automation systems, and AI productivity tools.
Provided consulting services for enterprise AI solutions and workflow optimization.

jobs.title: Operations Manager
points: Directly led a team of 10-12, indirectly managed 300+ members across China, the Philippines, Malaysia, and Vietnam.
Overseas assignments: Dubai Business Bay (4 months), Clark, Philippines (1.5 years), Makati/BGC (1 year).
Utilized Python and Telegram Bot API to enhance data-driven decision-making.
Managed all operations except finance and retail, reporting directly to the Chairman.

jobs.title: R&D Department Manager
points: Rebuilt team: Recruited new talent and reformed performance evaluations in response to 50%+ employee turnover.
Implemented Scrum development processes and internal/external testing environments.
Developed an operational anomaly reporting system, automating workflows with JIRA.
Resolved iOS certificate issues and IP blocking problems for in-house applications.

jobs.title: Head of Data Science Department
points: Built the data science department from the ground up.
Established a complete environment (Linux, Python, Docker, Jupyter, RStudio) within one month.
Predicted player churn and implemented retention strategies.
Detected arbitrage players and compiled quarterly operational reports.

jobs.title: Founder
points: Founded a project-based consulting firm, assembling freelance teams based on project needs.
Sanlih E-Television Vidol: Developed a web drama recommendation system.
Chunghwa Telecom: Provided big data Hadoop cluster consulting and maintenance.
E.SUN Bank: Implemented cross-device member attribution mechanisms.
ITRI Industry College: Analyzed data for industry talent competency assessments and international enterprise job vacancies.

jobs.title: Big Data R&D Engineer
points: Designed data collection processes and ETL pipelines.
Used statistical methods for data analysis to support decision-making.
Semantic analysis of dietary habits for disease patients: Built sentiment lexicons, developed scoring models, and automated reports for top 5 recommended/avoided foods for various diseases.

featured.subtitle: Showcasing AI-Native Development and Rapid Delivery Capabilities

projects.name: LINE Bot Booking System
projects.tagline: Clinic Appointment Management System Delivered in 48 Hours
projects.highlight: 48-Hour Delivery | Fully Automated Process | 95%+ Client Satisfaction
projects.description: Built a complete LINE Bot booking system for a physical therapy clinic, reducing appointment process time by 70% and significantly boosting client satisfaction. Integrated Google Calendar for real-time availability checks.

projects.name: ThreadsBot Automation
projects.highlight: Multi-Agent Collaboration | 300% Increase in Posting Frequency
projects.description: Developed an intelligent social media automation system using multiple AI agents for collaborative work. Achieved a 3x increase in engagement rate and reduced manual operation time by 80% through automated content analysis and scheduling optimization.

projects.name: Personal OS Course
projects.tagline: Personal Operating System Course for the AI Era
projects.highlight: 100% Participants Successfully Built AI Systems | Hands-On Approach
projects.description: Designed and taught a comprehensive course series, helping non-technical professionals build their own AI-driven personal operating systems. Participants learned to use AI tools like Claude Code and MCP to automate workflows and boost productivity.

philosophy.title: Technical Philosophy
philosophy.content: My focus isn't on 'how many languages I know,' but on 'how quickly I can solve problems.' In the era of AI collaboration, the key isn't writing every line of code by hand, but rather: 1) knowing which tools to combine, 2) designing maintainable system architectures, and 3) understanding how to make AI your development partner.
